data.title: French Funerals & Cremations
data.meta_description: Charles Mann, 69, beloved husband and father, was called to his eternal resting place alongside his dogs and brothers on December 12, 2017. He entered this world on February 3,...
data.text:
Charles Mann, 69, beloved husband and father, was called to his eternal resting place alongside his dogs and brothers on December 12, 2017. He entered this world on February 3, 1948 in Denver, CO, born to George and Stella Mann.

He is survived by his wife, Pamela Mann; daughter, Hayley Mann; son, Christopher Mann; and his grandchildren. Charles, a lifetime collector of cars, models and toys, he was active in several clubs and seemed to have friends everywhere. He was also a devout catholic, a member of the Knights Columbus, and an alumnus of the Kappa Sigma Fraternity.

A Rosary will be recited on Wednesday, December 27, 2017, 7:00 p.m. with visitation starting at 6:00 p.m., at FRENCH - University. High Mass Services will be Thursday, December 28, 2017, 11:00 a.m., with visitation starting at 10:00 a.m., at Our Lady of Peace Chapel, 1420 San Pedro NE. Interment will follow at Sunset Memorial Park, 924 Menaul Blvd. NE.

“You may not like me but, you’ll always remember me”.
